meanings.sent1: The sunset was the beautifullest sight I had ever seen.
meanings.sent2: She wore the beautifullest dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: The flowers in the garden were having a competition to see who could be the beautifullest.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the beautifullest ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The painting captured the beautifullest essence of nature.

meanings.definition: Most beautiful in appearance or character
meanings.sent1: The princess was known for her beautifullest heart.
meanings.sent2: The garden was filled with the beautifullest roses.
meanings.sent3: The beautifullest puppy in the litter was always up to mischief.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was the beautifullest melody in the entire choir.
meanings.sent5: The mountain range offered the beautifullest view of the valley below.
